member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseByteOrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its System.Byte equivalent. Returns 0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the byte to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseInt16OrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its System.Int16 equivalent. Returns 0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseInt32OrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its integer equivalent. Returns 0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseInt32OrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its integer equivalent. Returns null if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseInt64OrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its System.Int64 equivalent. Returns 0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseInt64OrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its System.Int64 equivalent. Returns 0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseFloatOrZero(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a number to its float equivalent. Returns 0.0 if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the integer to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseDateTimeOrMinval(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its System.DateTime equivalent. Returns DateTime.MinValue if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the DateTime to convert

member.name: M:Utilities.Extensions.StringExtensions.ParseDateTimeOrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its System.DateTime equivalent. Returns null if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing the DateTime to convert
